title: Another developer changing things for the worse!
text: Up till yesterday, this app would tell me what is due and when, whenever I would click on the receipt icon. Today, it shows every order I‚Äôve ever made with Shop Pay and what was delivered. I don‚Äôt need the app to tell me what I received! I already know that! What I need is to know what‚Äôs due and when, just like before! Why would you change that? How is this new way useful? Are your customers supposed to spend time calculating what‚Äôs due and figuring out the correct date to pay it? I already hated how it doesn‚Äôt show when the first payment is due on a new purchase. Why? You don‚Äôt think that is useful and important information to have handy at a glance so customers can be sure to have what‚Äôs needed in their accounts? A first payment snuck up on me and not only could I not manually pay it from a different account, but I also could not transfer funds into the payment method associated with my account. This is the only platform of this type that I‚Äôve used, where you can‚Äôt see what payment method you chose to draw payments from, till after the first payment is made. Most people may only use one payment method. But I don‚Äôt, because I use certain cards at certain times and sometimes I need to change that at the spur of the moment. This app has zero flexibility where that can be done before making the first payment. Highly inconvenient. So then what happens? They can‚Äôt take the money and your payment ends up late, because you can only change the payment method with the link inside of the non-payment/late notice. And when is the cut-off time? If I pay on a certain date, that‚Äôs what I expect to be reflected in my account, not pushed till the next day, thereby making the payment late! UGH! This is so dang frustrating!
